scripts.build-win: electron-packager . remote-telemetry-system --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --prune --icon=img/icon/icon.ico --out=build --version-string.CompanyName="PolibaCorse" --version-string.FileDescription="Remote Telemtry System by PolibaCorse" --version-string.ProductName="Remote Telemtry System - PolibaCorse"
scripts.build: npm run build-linux && npm run build-win && npm run build-mac
